description: This header file defines utility functions within the Utils namespace for synchronizing and persisting files and JSON settings, used as helper functions in a larger C++ project.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes a file by opening it, flushing buffers, and calling fsync to ensure data is written to disk.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persist JSON settings to a file, updating specific key with new value and ensuring data is saved.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
